title: co查询插件如何查看玩家用了什么指令
author: EsHappyさん
txt_content:
就是说一个指令 
然后可以查询玩家用了什么指令
可以的。
不是回档

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
zz1171705171 发表于 2014-7-21 12:22
这不是一个有效的动作
你帮我打。。
名字叫做soil

/co l u:soil a:command t:1d

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 jiuerd 于 2014-7-21 12:21 编辑 
zz1171705171 发表于 2014-7-21 11:29
@jiuerd
 /co lookuprollback u:<user> t:<time> r:<radius> a:<action> b:<blocks> e:<exclude>

a:command

replies.author: EsHappyさん
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-21 11:47
/co rollback u: t: r: a: b: e:

a:command
不可以{:10_522:}

replies.author: EsHappyさん
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-21 11:47
/co rollback u: t: r: a: b: e:

a:command
比如我要查一个叫做soil的玩家
查今天早上7-12点的事情怎么查

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
zz1171705171 发表于 2014-7-21 12:06
比如我要查一个叫做soil的玩家
查今天早上7-12点的事情怎么查
没注意结果复制错了；
 /co lookup u:<user> t:<time> r:<radius> a:<action> b:<blocks> e:<exclude>
a:<action> - Restrict the lookup to a certain action
For example, if you wanted to only rollback blocks placed, you would use a:+block

Here's a list of all the actions:

    a:block (blocks placed/broken)
    a:+block (blocks placed)
    a:-block (blocks broken)
    a:click (player interactions)
    a:container (items taken from or put in chests, etc.)
    a:+container (items put in chests, etc.)
    a:-container (items taken from chests, etc.)
    a:kill (mobs/animals killed)
    a:chat (messages sent in chat)
    a:command (commands used)
    a:session (player logins/logouts)
    a:+session (player logins)
    a:-session (player logouts)

replies.author: EsHappyさん
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-21 12:19

 /co lookup u: t: r: a: b: e:
这不是一个有效的动作
你帮我打。。
名字叫做soil
查询是今天早上7-12点

replies.author: fefe12
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-21 11:25
/co l u:soil a:command t:1d
我对你这个蠢货无语了
